Aircopter Project 2020-2021

Announcements

Hey everyone! We're super excited to work with you guys this year. Applications will be due this Saturday, and we will be trying our best to get the results out on Sunday. Our first lecture will take place Tuesday evening, so if you plan on joining please plan to keep that time open!
